title: Inside Training : Build up to Bayern
body_text:
As we head into final preparations for tomorrow's match-up with Bayern Munich, our cameras went behind the scenes for Inside Training.
It was all smiles at London Colney as our Gunners put in the hard work ahead of the biggest match of the season so far: a Women's Champions League quarter-final.
After Bayern got the upper hand at Allianz Arena last week, we'll be looking to build on the positives from the first leg to secure a win in front of a 20,000-strong crowd at Emirates Stadium - there's still time to get your tickets for the game.
Click play on the video above to see all the build-up ahead of the game.
